history.content:
The EECS Department is now accepting applications for the Two Sigma Undergraduate Scholarships and the Two Sigma Diversity Undergraduate Scholarships. To be eligible, you must be enrolled full-time in the third year of your bachelor’s degree program in EECS or L&S CS and plan to graduate in Spring 2023. Your application details may be submitted here; other application items should be sent to me directly. The deadline is Tuesday, October 26 at 11:59pm.

Please submit the following:

  • Scholarship Applicant Information Form (see link above)
  • A current resume, including your current email, phone number and mailing address.
  • names of two faculty who have agreed to write letters of recommendation for you, plus a paragraph about you by e-mail (to me) from one of them by 10/26
  • An official copy of your transcript.

Two Sigma Scholarship Benefits:

  • Scholarship recipients will receive a one-time award of $15,000 USD, paid to the Scholarship recipient directly, which, as a condition of the scholarship, may only be used for tuition, fees required to enroll at or attend their university, and books, supplies, equipment and course-related fees for courses at their university.
  • A Two Sigma Research Mentor will be assigned to each Scholarship recipient.
  • Each Scholarship recipient will be guaranteed a first-round interview for a Two Sigma 2022 summer internship.
history.subject: Two Sigma Scholarships, Due October 26
